Name: Brucite Mg(OH)_2
Type: Mineral
Class: Hydroxides
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 45-125um
Sample No.: OH-1A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Nevada, Nye County, Gabbs
Collected by JPL
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: oh01aa.txt
